description: The Master of Magnetism has embraced a self-proclaimed role of detective, judge, jury, and executioner against those who harm mutants. One of the greatest Marvel anti-heroes ever, Magneto exacts his own form of mutant justice, by any means necessary.

gameplay.note: Ability Accuracy is the chance to trigger abilities such as Armor Up or Regeneration (sometimes refereed to as Proc Chance by the community).
gameplay.description: Magnetized reduces the Ability Accuracy of all metal opponents.

signature.name: Urgent Refraction
signature.description: Triggered when his health is low, Magneto bends a dense electromagnetic field around his body to create a personal force field, preventing him from losing more than 7% Health from a single source. Magneto triggers this ability any time he is below 60% health and it prevents him from losing more than 7% of his total health from any single attack.
signature.note: Due to the nature of how Special 3 attacks work, this also works on all enemy Special 3 attacks. This is because the Special 3 damage only calculates once, and is then split between the various attacks during the animation. Even multi hit attacks like Cyclops’s are considered to come from a “single source” of damage, and are reduced by Refraction.

1.name: Bloody Shrapnel
1.description: 50% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 200% of your Attack as direct damage over 10 Seconds.
1.note: This has 2 potential triggers during the attack, allowing up to 2 stacks of Bleed.

2.description: 50% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 200% of your Attack as direct damage over 10 Seconds. 100% chance to inflict Heal Block, preventing the target from recovering Health for 10 seconds.
2.note: This has 1 potential trigger during the attack, allowing up to 1 stack of Bleed.
2.name: Bleeding Fracture

3.description: 50% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 200% of your Attack as direct damage over 10 Seconds. 100% chance to inflict Heal Block, preventing the target from recovering Health for 10 seconds. 100% chance to Armor Break, removing enemy Armor and applying 10% Armor reduction for 8 seconds.
3.note: This has 1 potential trigger during the attack, allowing up to 1 stack of Bleed.
3.name: Cold-Blooded Fusion
